Bankroll Simulation

Source: R/bankroll_plot.R
bankroll_plot.Rd

This function simulates and visualizes a bettors bankroll over a number of bets using their edge.

bankroll_plot(
  bets = 256,
  win_rate = 0.55,
  bet_size = 100,
  sim_length = 1000,
  avg_odds = -110,
  odds_type = "us",
  current_bet = NULL,
  current_win = NULL
)

Arguments

bets

The number of bets (256)

win_rate

The average expected win rate of the bets (0-1)

bet_size

The dollar amount of each bet. (100)

sim_length

The number of simulations. (1,000)

avg_odds

The average odds of the bets (-110)

odds_type

Type of odds for the output. Possible values are:

  • us, American Odds

  • dec, Decimal Odds

  • frac, Fractional Odds

current_bet

Optional input - Your current total number of tracked bets. (125)

current_win

Optional input - Your current total amount won/loss from your tracked bets. (950)

Value

Plot showing the bankroll results of the simulated bets. The function also outputs the percentage of positive and negative final bankroll over the course of the simulation.

Examples

bankroll_plot(
  bets = 256,
  win_rate = 0.55,
  bet_size = 100,
  sim_length = 1000,
  avg_odds = -110,
  odds_type = "us"
)
#> 
#> Positive Negative 
#>    0.796    0.204 
#> 
#>  Median Profit/Loss = $1,450
#> Warning: It is deprecated to specify `guide = FALSE` to remove a guide. Please use `guide = "none"` instead.

bankroll_plot(
  sim_length = 500,
  avg_odds = -110,
  win_rate = 0.5455
)
#> 
#> Positive Negative 
#>     0.74     0.26 
#> 
#>  Median Profit/Loss = $1,030
#> Warning: It is deprecated to specify `guide = FALSE` to remove a guide. Please use `guide = "none"` instead.

bankroll_plot(
  sim_length = 250,
  avg_odds = -115,
  win_rate = 0.5255,
  current_bet = 100,
  current_win = -500
)
#> 
#> Positive Negative 
#>    0.408    0.592 
#> 
#>  Median Profit/Loss = -$522.50
#> Warning: It is deprecated to specify `guide = FALSE` to remove a guide. Please use `guide = "none"` instead.

bankroll_plot(
  sim_length = 300,
  avg_odds = -109,
  win_rate = 0.57,
  current_bet = 175,
  current_win = 5000
)
#> 
#>   Positive   Negative 
#> 0.93333333 0.06666667 
#> 
#>  Median Profit/Loss = $2,610
#> Warning: It is deprecated to specify `guide = FALSE` to remove a guide. Please use `guide = "none"` instead.

bankroll_plot()
#> 
#> Positive Negative 
#>    0.784    0.216 
#> 
#>  Median Profit/Loss = $1,450
#> Warning: It is deprecated to specify `guide = FALSE` to remove a guide. Please use `guide = "none"` instead.
